targets.query:
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "outside_environmental_sensor_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "bedroom_environmental_sensor_temperature" or r["entity_id"] == "living_room_current_temperature" or r["entity_id"] == "main_floor_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "basement_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "server_room_environment_sensor_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendly_name"] == "Server Room Environment Sensor Temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "xcel_itron_5_instantaneous_demand_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 1m)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> yield(name: "last")

import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "living_room_current_humidity" or r["entity_id"] == "bedroom_environmental_sensor_humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "date"
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 15m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "living_room_current_humidity" or r["entity_id"] == "bedroom_environmental_sensor_humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "date"
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 15m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "outside_environmental_sensor_humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 15m)
  |> yield(name: "last")

matcher.options: value {domain="sensor", entity_id="xcel_itron_5_instantaneous_demand_value", friendly_name="Xcel Itron 5 Instantaneous Demand value", name="W", source="HA"}
value {domain="sensor", entity_id="espresso_machine_electric_consumption_w", friendly_name="Espresso Machine Electric Consumption [W]", name="W", source="HA"}

targets.query:
import "date"
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "xcel_itron_5_instantaneous_demand_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 1m)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "espresso_machine_electric_consumption_w")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 1m)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
import "interpolate"

from(bucket: "eaton-5px2200rt")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 1m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_load_percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _value: (float(v: r._value) * 19.2)
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> interpolate.linear(every: 1m)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

matcher.options: value {domain="sensor", entity_id="xcel_itron_5_instantaneous_demand_value", friendly_name="Xcel Itron 5 Instantaneous Demand value", name="W", source="HA"}
value {domain="sensor", entity_id="espresso_machine_electric_consumption_w", friendly_name="Espresso Machine Electric Consumption [W]", name="W", source="HA"}
